structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 183, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 225, sec. 8. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 239, sec. 208. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 289, sec. 1. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 219, sec. 1. -- Repealed , reenacted and amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 197, sec. 1. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 176, sec. 1.
